Attention This application has been optimized for the Zebra TC21/26/15/22/27/20/25 and MC22/27. You may experience performance issues on other Zebra devices OK Add Area List (tap on an area to edit). File List (Tap on a file to select it to import). Don\'t show this again! Database Files available
